description:
The Perfect Gem Set contains 333 in-game items, including artifacts required for the new job type, Machina, and a total of 25 kinds of gems (each gem type, as well as other jewels used as currency).

The following items are included:
<Rare Gems>
　Divine Weapon Gem x5
　Gold Gem x5 / Silver Gem x10 / Copper Gem x15
　Incremental Gem x10 / Intensification Gem x5 / Enhancement Gem x10
＜Weapon and Equipment Gems>
　Unnamed Gem ×20
　Sword Gem ×20 / Blade Gem ×20 / Heavy Weapon Gem ×20
　Long Staff Gem ×20
　Special Gem ×20 / Staff Gem ×20 / Bow Gem ×20
　Shield Gem x15 / Hat Gem x15 / Helmet Gem x15
　Light Armor Gem ×15 / Heavy Armor Gem ×15 / Inner Gem ×15
　Accessory Gem x15
＜Currency Jewels>
　Large Gem ×1
　Small Gem x2
　Gemstone x5

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.
name: Tons of Fun! Perfect Gem Set
